Submodules¶

app.json_controller module¶

Handles publisher detection and JSON validation/parsing/DB insertion originating from the Scholarly API’s Raw Endpoint Author: Harry Rybacki Date: 11June13

class app.json_controller.JSONController(submission=None, db=None, raw_file_pointer=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

determines publisher type of user submission and sends it to the validator and parser controllers. If the submission is successfully validated and parsed, it is handed off to the DB Controller for insertion.

Parameters:submission – JSON-formatted object representing user submission
Returns:flask.Response object with appropriate status code
Returns:201: created successfully
Returns:405: user submission error
detect_publisher()[source]¶

detects the publisher type of a user submission

Returns:String - publisher type
Returns:Response with user submission error code if publisher type does not exist
insert(parsed_submission)[source]¶

calls raw_db_controller to insert parsed submission into raw db

Returns:ObjectID - if insertion was successful
Retirn:None - if insertion was unsuccessful
parse()[source]¶

calls parsing_controller on a user submission

Returns:Scholarly standard JSON if parsing successful
Returns:Response with server error code if unable to be parsed
submit()[source]¶

calls the validate and parse methods. If successful, the insert method is called.

Returns:requests.Response(status=201) if creation/insertion was successful
Returns:requests.Response(status=405) if creation/insertion was unsuccessful
validate()[source]¶

calls the validaton_controller on a user submission

Returns:True - if validation is successful
Returns:False - if validation is unsuccessful

app.raw_db module¶

DB that interacts with the raw MongoDB Author: Harry Rybacki Date: 5June13

class app.raw_db.DB(host='localhost', port=27017)[source]¶

class representing pymongo raw DB object

add(submission)[source]¶

adds submission to articles db

Parameters:submission – JSON object to be inserted
Returns:ObjectID of newly inserted object

app.views module¶

routes file for handling get/post request for crowdscholar Author: Harry Rybacki Date: 5June13

app.views.ArticleEndpoint()[source]¶

Eventual landing page for searching/retrieving articles

app.views.PingEndpoint()[source]¶

API endpoint determines potential article hash exists in db

Returns:status code 201 – hash not present, continue submission
Returns:status code 204 – hash already exists, drop submission
app.views.RawEndpoint()[source]¶

RESTFull API endpoint for submitting raw article data.

Returns:status code 405 - invalid JSON or invalid request content-type
Returns:status code 400 - unsupported content-type requested or invalid publisher
Returns:status code 201 - successful submission
app.views.index()[source]¶

landing page for crowdscholar

Module contents¶

__init__ file loading and prepping necessary things
